title: Love Island's Tommy Fury slammed after cancelling club appearance
text:
Tommy was set to make an appearance at the Fever & Boutique nightclub in Plymouth (Picture: GC Images)

Love Island’s Tommy Fury has been branded a ‘diva’ by fans after he cancelled a nightclub appearance in Plymouth at the last minute.

The reality star was set to make an appearance at the Fever & Boutique nightclub in Plymouth on 4 October, but snubbed the event to instead attend Shocktober Fest with girlfriend Molly-Mae Hague.

The club confirmed the disappointing news in a statement on Facebook, as they revealed that fellow Love Islander Sam Bird will be replacing him.

‘Tommy Fury will not be joining us tonight BUT instead, we have SAM BIRD with a DJ set and PA!’ the club said.

‘Tommy’s management company confirmed on Wednesday that he would be making an appearance tonight, but earlier today he decided that he doesn’t want to make the journey down to Plymouth.

‘We are absolutely gutted and we’ve been frantically trying to sort a replacement out, and our friend Sam Bird has kindly offered to step in with a DJ set and PA to keep the party going!’

They later added that they were ‘sorry to let everyone down’, stating that Tommy’s cancellation was out of their control, offering all clubbers a free drink during the night to make up for the disappointment caused.

However, fans in the comments were less than impressed.

‘Literally just got a spray tan and my hair done for Tommy, FURYous,’ one fan said.

Nice pun.

Another added: ‘He doesn’t want to make the journey to Plymouth? Divvvva.’

‘What a joke as if… Sorry Plymouth isn’t good enough for him… ayy?!’ another commented.

Metro.co.uk have contacted reps for Tommy for comment.

Tommy was instead seen with Molly-Mae at the Shocktober Fest event in Crawley, Sussex, alongside stars such as fellow Love Island contestant Curtis Pritchard, Kerry Katona and Katie Price’s ex-husband Kieran Hayler.

Tommy instead attended Shocktober Fest with Molly-Mae Hague (Picture: Backgrid)

In the meantime, Sam also expressed his excitement at taking over Tommy’s guest spot at the club as DJ.

He shared a screenshot of a fan DM to his Instagram story, which read: ‘I can’t wait to see you tonight.

‘Saw you play in Magaluf three months ago and you was amazing!’

To which Sam replied: ‘Gonna be a good one @feverplymouth.’
